```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
## use pngquant to reduce size of PNG images
knit_hooks$set(pngquant = hook_pngquant)
pngquant <- "--speed=1 --quality=0-25"
# in case pngquant isn't available
if (!nzchar(Sys.which("pngquant"))) pngquant <- NULL 
```

This vignette from the R package [JMDplots](https://github.com/jedick/JMDplots) version `r packageDescription("JMDplots")$Version` contains supplementary plots from the paper by <a href="https://doi.org/10.3389/feart.2019.00180" title="CHNOSZ: Thermodynamic calculations and diagrams for geochemistry">Dick (2019)</a>.

```{r JMDplots, message = FALSE, results = "hide"}
library(JMDplots)
```

## Comparison of logK and maximum affinity methods (Figure S1)
```{r chnsztenS1, message = FALSE, fig.align='center', out.width='75%', fig.width = 6.5, fig.height = 5, pngquant = pngquant}
chnsztenS1()
```
